author: taylor
msg: Added new parameter for page in ActionParameter.
Added new attributes that will read the link types.

author: paulsp
msg: Next and Previous buttons where missing the "Customize" template.

author: taylor
msg: Tagged all Jetspeed threads as daemons (this.setDaemon(true))
This will allow for Jetspeed to properly shutdown with Tomcat 4.0.2 and greater.
As of version 4.0.2, Tomcat no longer calls System.exit(0) when shutdown, so user threads are not stopped.
